abstract: Analysis. Texas Christian delivers crushing blow to Big East conference when news of its of its imminent departure to the Big 12 emerges. Uncertainty of conference realignment continues to overshadow college football season.
snippet: Texas Christian’s decision to join the Big 12 and leave the Big East, which it had yet to join officially, leaves the conference with only six football-playing universities.
lead_paragraph: Texas Christian’s decision to join the Big 12 and leave the Big East, which it had yet to join officially, leaves the conference with only six football-playing universities.

headline.main: Loss of T.C.U. Imperils Big East’s Football Future
headline.print_headline: Loss of T.C.U. Leaves Big East’s Football Future in Doubt
headline.seo: Big East Loses Texas Christian, Putting Football Future in Doubt
